panels.description: Latest sample of the value of number of active tasks, summed over all executors active in the selected time filter interval.

targets.query: select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT executor_id, last("value") as perprocessval FROM "executor.threadpool" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND "qty" = 'activeTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: N# of Active Tasks - latest value

panels.description: Latest sample of the value of number of active tasks, summed over all executors active in the selected time filter interval.

targets.query: select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT executor_id, last("value") as perprocessval FROM "executor.threadpool" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND "qty" = 'completeTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: N# of Completed Tasks - latest value

panels.description: Total task CPU usage from task metrics. Displays CPU time used for all the completed tasks, from the task metrics data source. Note, values from executors that are no more active in the selected time window are not counted.

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from (SELECT executor_id, last(value) as lastvalperprocess FROM "executor.cpuTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' and $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: Total Task CPU Usage

panels.description: Total time spent in GC operations during task execution. Displays values for all the completed tasks, from the task metrics data source. Note, values from executors that are no more active in the selected time window are not counted.

targets.query: select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT executor_id, last("value") as perprocessval FROM "executor.jvmGCTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' and $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: Total Task GC Time

panels.description: Total Number of records that were read from Spark application. Derived from Spark input metrics.

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from (SELECT executor_id,  last(value) as lastvalperprocess from "executor.recordsRead"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName'  and "qty" = 'count' and  $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: Total Records Read

panels.description: Total output records from Spark application derived from Spark metrics

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from (SELECT executor_id,  last(value) as lastvalperprocess from "executor.recordsWritten"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName'  and "qty" = 'count' and  $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: Total Records Writeen

panels.description: JVM metric from MemoryMXBean. Latest value of the % of heap memory used, averaging over executors and driver.

targets.query: select mean(lastvalperprocess)*100 from  (SELECT process, last(value) as lastvalperprocess FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND mem_type='heap' and qty='usage' and $timeFilter GROUP BY exxecutor_id)

panels.title: Heap memory Used (% of maximum usable)

panels.description: Total executor CPU time computed from from executor metrics. Displays CPU time used by all the executors' JVMs active in the selected time filter interval. It contains CPU time used for tasks and other activities in the JVM, notably garbage collection. Note, values from executors that are no more active in the selected time window are not counted.

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from ( SELECT executor_id, last(value) as lastvalperprocess FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' and "qty" = 'time' and $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: Total Executor CPU time

panels.description: Bytes read from HDFS. Note, values from executors that are no more active in the selected time window are not counted.

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from (SELECT executor_id, last(value) as lastvalperprocess from "executor.filesystem.hdfs"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' and "qty"='read_bytes' and  $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)

panels.title: HDFS Bytes Read

targets.query: select sum(lastvalperprocess) from (SELECT executor_id,  last(value) as lastvalperprocess from "executor.filesystem.hdfs"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName'  and "qty" = 'write_bytes' and  $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id)
SELECT last("value") FROM "stage.failedStages" WHERE ("applicationid" =~ /^$ApplicationId$/) AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Number of active tasks per executor

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "executor.threadpool" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND "qty" = 'activeTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Number of Active Tasks

panels.description: Total executor CPU utilization computed from executors' metrics. The value is normalized in "N# of core equivalent", that is the number of cores running at 100% that would give an equivalent value of CPU utilization.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  / 1000000000 FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND "qty" = 'time'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Executors JVM CPU Utilization (N# cores-equivalent)

panels.description: Time the JVM process has spent in garbage collection. The value is normalized in "N# of core equivalent", that is the hypothetical number of cores working at 100% on GC that would give an equivalent result.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  / 1000 FROM  "executor.jvmGCTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time (expressed in milliseconds) - from task metrics

panels.description: Total task CPU utilization computed from task metrics. The value is normalized in "N# of core equivalent", that is the number of cores running at 100% that would give an equivalent value of CPU utilization.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  / 1000000000 FROM "executor.cpuTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Task CPU Utilization (N# cores equivalent) -  from Task metrics

panels.description: Executor run time and wait time components compared. The run time spent by Spark executors is aggregated per area of activity. The difference between run time and wait time measurements can be interpreted as due to missing instrumentation (e.g. HDFS/filesystem I/O wait time). The values are normalized in "N# of core equivalent", that is the number of cores running at 100% that would yield an equivalent value for the given metric.

targets.query: select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000000000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.deserializeCpuTime"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.deserializeTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000000000 as perprocessval FROM "cpuTime.count" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000000000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.shuffleWriteTime" WHERE "applicationid" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.resultSerializationTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.shuffleFetchWaitTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.jvmGCTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) / 1000 as perprocessval FROM "executor.runTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), executor_id) GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Executor run time and wait time components

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) / 1000  FROM "executor.runTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id
SELECT last("value") FROM "executor.threadpool" WHERE ("app_id" =~ /^$PipelineName$/) AND  "qty"='completeTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "executor_id"

panels.title: Number of completed tasks per executor

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) / 1000000000  FROM "executor.shuffleWriteTime" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY process

panels.title: Shuffle Write Time - from task metrics

panels.description: Total memory (heap + non-heap) used per executor.  From MemoryMXBean.

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter AND "executor_id"  !=  'driver' and "qty" ='used' GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Executor JVM Total Memory Used

panels.description: Heap memory used per executor.  From MemoryMXBean.

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter AND "executor_id"  !=  'driver' and "qty" ='used' GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Executor JVM Heap Memory Used

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "jvm" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter AND "executor_id"  =  'driver' and "qty" ='used' GROUP BY executor_id

panels.description: Storage memory and disk used by the block manager.

targets.query: SELECT value FROM  "BlockManager"  WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND  qty = 'onHeapMemUsed_MB' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id
SELECT value FROM "BlockManager" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND  qty = 'offHeapMemUsed_MB' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id
SELECT value FROM "BlockManager" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND qty = 'diskSpaceUsed_MB'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Block Manager: memory and disk used

yaxes.label: Block manager memory and disk used

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "executor.filesystem.hdfs" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter AND qty='read_bytes' GROUP BY executor_id
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "executor.filesystem.hdfs" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter AND qty='write_bytes'  GROUP BY executor_id
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "executor.shuffleTotalBytesRead" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

panels.title: Shuffle Total Bytes Read/sec - from task metrics

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "executor.shuffleBytesWritten" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY executor_id

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) as perprocessval FROM "executor.shuffleRemoteBytesRead" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), process) GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(perprocessval) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("value"), 1s) as perprocessval FROM "executor.shuffleLocalBytesRead" WHERE "app_id" = '$PipelineName' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),  "process") GROUP BY time($__interval)

list.label: ApplicationId
list.name: PipelineName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "app_id" where "application" =~ /$Pipeline/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "executor_id" where "application" =~ /$Pipeline/
list.label: ExecutorId
list.name: Executors
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "executor_id" where "application" =~ /$Pipeline/
